className.description: An optional className to apply to the card.

children.description: Any Card parts that should be rendered.

defaultExpanded.description:
Boolean if the card is expanded by default when there is an expander
component.

raise.description: Boolean if the card should raise on hover when on a desktop display.

expanded.description:
Boolean if the card is currently expanded. This will require the `onExpanderClick` function
to toggle the state. The card will become controlled if this is not `undefined`.

onExpanderClick.description: An optional function to call when the expander is clicked.

expanderIconClassName.description: The icon className to use for the expander icon.

expanderIconChildren.description: Any icon children required for the expander icon.

expanderTooltipPosition.description: The tooltip position for the expander icon.

expanderTooltipLabel.description: The optional tooltip to display for the expander icon.

expanderTooltipDelay.description: An optional delay before the tooltip appears for the expander icon on hover.

tableCard.description:
Boolean if the card contains a table. It will update the styling accordingly.
When using the `DataTable` component, do not wrap it in a `CardText` component.

```js
<Card tableCard={true}>
  <CardTitle title="Example />
  <DataTable>
    ...
  </DataTable>
</Card>
```

onMouseOver.description: An optional function to call when the mouseover event is triggered.

onMouseLeave.description: An optional function to call when the mouseleave event is triggered.

onTouchStart.description: An optional function to call when the touchstart event is triggered.

description:
The `CardActionOverlay` component is a simple wrapper for generating an overlay
for the `CardMedia` component by having a `CardTitle` and an array of props
for generating `FlatButton` for the `CardActions` component.

actions.description: An array of flat button props.

children.description: Any children to display in the `CardTitle` component.

type.name: custom

description:
The `CardActions` component is used for adding actions on your card.
The actions should be `FlatButton`s or `IconButton`s.

This component can act as a `CardExpander`.

isExpander.description:
Boolean if this component should act as an expander and inject the
`CardExpander`.

className.description: An optional className to apply to the actions container.

centered.description: Boolean if the actions should be centered.

stacked.description: Boolean if the actions should be stacked.

description:
The `CardMedia` component is used to display images or some sort
media.

className.description: An optional className to apply to the card media component.

type.name: custom
type.raw: deprecated(PropTypes.node, 'Use the `MediaOverlay` component as a child instead')

overlay.description:
An optional overlay component to be rendered over the media. This *should*
be A `CardTitle`, `CardActions` or both.

forceAspect.description: Boolean if the aspect ratio should be forced.

expandable.description:
Boolean if this component should be expandable when there is a `CardExpander`
above it in the `Card`.

component.description: The component to render the card media as.

type.name: custom
type.raw:
componentDeprecated(
  'There were no unique styles for media in cards so it is simpler to just use the ' +
  '`Media` component.'
)

description:
The `CardText` component is a simple wrapper for text or any content in a `Card`.
It really just adds correct padding and font color.

expandable.description:
Boolean if this component should be expandable when there is a `CardExpander`
above it in the `Card`.

description:
The `CardTitle` component is used to render a title in a Card along
with an optional subtitle or avatar.

id.description: An optional id to add to the `title`.

children.description:
Any additional children to display in the title block
after the avatar, title, and subtitle.

avatar.description: An optional avatar to display before the title and subtitle.

isExpander.description:
Boolean if the `CardTitle` component should inject a button
for expanding all children below it.
